summary: In Roman-ruled Britain, a young Roman soldier endeavors to honor his father's memory by finding his lost legion's golden emblem.
cast: Channing Tatum|István Göz|Bence Gerö|Denis O'Hare|Paul Ritter|Zsolt László|Julian Lewis Jones|Aladár Laklóth|Marcell Miklós|Bálint Magyar|Ferenc Pataki|Bálint Antal|Lukács Bicskey|Douglas Henshall|James Hayes|Donald Sutherland|András Faragó|Jamie Bell|Simon Paisley Day|Dakin Matthews|Pip Carter|Ben O'Brien|Róbert Bánlaki|Brian Gleeson|Jon Campling|Mark Strong|Tahar Rahim|Thomas Henry|Ned Dennehy|Ralph Aiken|Granville Saxton|Walter van Dyk|Jean-Marc Chautems|Robin Atkin Downes|Drew Kuzma|Seb Muirhead|Allan Sutherland
title: La legión del águila
